faqs.question: What does PhonePe do?
faqs.answer: PhonePe is India's leading digital payments platform offering UPI payments, bill payments, recharges, investments, insurance, lending, and business payment solutions. We serve over 61 crore registered users across India.

faqs.question: Is PhonePe free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! PhonePe is completely FREE for personal UPI payments, money transfers, recharges, and bill payments. For businesses, our Payment Gateway is also FREE with 0% transaction fees.

faqs.question: What is the Payment Gateway pricing?
faqs.answer: PhonePe Payment Gateway is absolutely FREE with ZERO transaction fees. No setup cost, no monthly charges. You can accept payments via UPI, cards, wallets, and net banking at zero cost.

faqs.question: Who can use PhonePe for business?
faqs.answer: Any business can use PhonePe! We support online businesses (e-commerce, apps, websites) with our Payment Gateway, and offline businesses (retail stores, restaurants, kirana shops) with QR codes and SmartSpeakers.

faqs.question: What is PhonePe SmartSpeaker?
faqs.answer: PhonePe SmartSpeaker is a device for offline merchants that announces payments with voice alerts in real-time. It has up to 4 days battery life, smart replay features, and helps merchants track payments without checking their phones constantly.

faqs.question: How quickly do I get settlements?
faqs.answer: For Payment Gateway, settlements are instant. For offline QR payments, settlements typically happen within T+1 business day to your linked bank account.

faqs.question: What payment methods does PhonePe support?
faqs.answer: PhonePe supports all major payment methods: UPI, Credit/Debit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, RuPay), Net Banking, Wallets, UPI Lite, Credit Line on UPI, and RuPay Credit Card on UPI.

faqs.question: Is PhonePe safe and secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! PhonePe uses bank-grade security with PCI-DSS certification and ISO compliance. All transactions are encrypted and protected. We have robust fraud detection systems to keep your money safe.

faqs.question: Can I use PhonePe internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes! PhonePe International allows you to make UPI payments at select merchants in Singapore, UAE, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Bhutan, and Mauritius.

faqs.question: What is PhonePe's market reach?
faqs.answer: PhonePe has 61+ crore registered users and is accepted at 4.4+ crore merchants across 98% of India's postal codes. One in three Indians uses PhonePe.

faqs.question: How do I get started with PhonePe for my business?
faqs.answer: It's simple! For offline stores, download the PhonePe Business app and generate your free QR code instantly. For online businesses, visit business.phonepe.com and sign up for the Payment Gateway - integration takes just a few hours.

faqs.question: Does PhonePe offer loans?
faqs.answer: Yes! PhonePe offers consumer lending for personal needs and merchant lending for business growth. Loans feature quick approval, minimal documentation, and flexible repayment options.

faqs.question: What team size is ideal for PhonePe business solutions?
faqs.answer: PhonePe works for all business sizes - from solo entrepreneurs and small kirana shops to large enterprises. Our solutions scale with your business needs.

faqs.question: Can I invest through PhonePe?
faqs.answer: Yes! PhonePe offers investments in mutual funds (liquid, tax-saving, equity, debt, hybrid), 24K gold (starting from ₹5), recurring deposits, and NPS contributions. Zero commission on direct mutual funds.

faqs.question: What is UPI Lite?
faqs.answer: UPI Lite enables faster, low-value transactions (up to ₹500) without entering UPI PIN. It's perfect for quick daily payments like tea, snacks, auto rides, etc.

faqs.question: How do I contact PhonePe support?
faqs.answer: You can reach PhonePe support through: 1) In-app Help Center, 2) Website: phonepe.com/contact-us, 3) 24/7 customer support via the app. We also have dedicated business support for merchants.

faqs.question: What industries does PhonePe serve?
faqs.answer: PhonePe serves all industries including: retail, e-commerce, food & beverage, healthcare, education, travel, utilities, financial services, entertainment, and more. If you accept payments, PhonePe works for you!
